alert.note: Alert for Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 4:19AM CDT until September 06 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WILL AND SOUTHERN DUPAGE COUNTIES... At 419 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Naperville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Naperville, Bolingbrook, Wheaton, Downers Grove, Elmhurst, Lombard, Romeoville, Plainfield, Addison, Woodridge, Glen Ellyn, Hinsdale, Lemont, Burr Ridge, Oak Brook, Westmont, Lisle, Darien, Villa Park, Bensenville, Warrenville, Northlake, Winfield and Willowbrook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
